page.title: 02Swale View Caravan Site
page.content: Mr Carter owns a seven acre caravan site which consists of 100 permanent caravans. It started in 1946. People can bring their own tents and caravans sometimes for holidays or sometimes just for weekends, and you can bring pets. There is an adventure playground for children, a laundry and a games room that has things like table tennis. There are showers but no phones. They have a shop which is open 9.00am to 8.00pm. It sells groceries, ice cream, sweets and toys, but the people have to bring their own food. There are 6 and 8 berth caravans, and most of them have electricity. The 8 berth caravans are 28 feet long and have a dining area, lounge, 2 bunks and 2 double beds. This caravan site helps to maintain the tourist industry in this area.
